name: Reputational Damage
description: Degree to which the system and organization mitigate reputational risks and manage public perception.

values.name: Minimized Risk
values.description: System designed to minimize reputational risks, with ongoing monitoring, stakeholder engagement, and a crisis management plan.

values.name: Risk Assessment
values.description: Reputational risk assessment conducted, with communication plans and mitigation strategies in place.

values.name: Awareness
values.description: Some awareness of reputational risks, limited monitoring of public perception, but no proactive measures.

values.name: High Risk
values.description: High risk of severe reputational damage due to system errors, biases, or security breaches, no mitigation strategies.
